at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.controller.cube

Class SceneRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.controller.cube.SceneRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLSurfaceView.Renderer

    public class SceneRenderer
extends Object
implements GLSurfaceView.Renderer
    The class that represents the Renderer for the MainGLView.
    Author:
    Mario Kraml

        _dragHeight - The height of the dragging.

      • stopDragCube

        public void stopDragCube()
        Dragging the cube has been stopped so the cube has to be rotated with the same drag speed to the nearest cube side.

      • setBackCubePosition

        private void setBackCubePosition(Step _newCubeSide)
        Sets back the cube and side objects positions so that the front side is again on the front and all textures are shown normal and not rotated or upside down.

        _newCubeSide - The new side of the cube that is on the front.
